pages.text: An item used to copy configuration data from one machine to another.$(p)To copy data to the card, $(k:sneak) + right click on the source machine, then right click the destination machine. Chat messages will inform you of the success/failure

Supported machines: $(li)$(l:block/digital_miner)Digital Miner$(/l) $(li)$(l:energy_cubes)Energy Cubes$(/l) $(li)$(l:block/formulaic_assemblicator)Formulaic Assemblicator$(/l) $(li)$(l:block/logistical_sorter)Logistical Sorter$(/l) $(li)$(l:block/oredictionificator)Oredictionificator$(/l) $(li)and any machine with configurable sides.
